name: mapreduce.reduce.cpu.vcores
description:
The number of virtual cores to request from the scheduler for
  each reduce task.

name: fs.s3a.committer.threads
description:
Number of threads in committers for parallel operations on files
    (upload, commit, abort, delete...)

name: dfs.client.max.block.acquire.failures
description: Maximum failures allowed when trying to get block information from a specific datanode.

name: dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.initial.delay.ms
description:
The initial delay (unit is ms) for locateFollowingBlock,
    the delay time will increase exponentially(double) for each retry
    until dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.max.delay.ms is reached,
    after that the delay for each retry will be
    dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.max.delay.ms.

name: dfs.datanode.ec.reconstruction.stripedread.timeout.millis
description: Datanode striped read timeout in milliseconds.

name: dfs.mover.moverThreads
description: Configure the balancer's mover thread pool size.

name: dfs.client.retry.interval-ms.get-last-block-length
description:
Retry interval in milliseconds to wait between retries in getting
    block lengths from the datanodes.

name: dfs.namenode.lease-hard-limit-sec
description: Determines the namenode automatic lease recovery interval in seconds.

name: hadoop.security.group.mapping.ldap.connection.timeout.ms
description:
This property is the connection timeout (in milliseconds) for LDAP
    operations. If the LDAP provider doesn't establish a connection within the
    specified period, it will abort the connect attempt. Non-positive value
    means no LDAP connection timeout is specified in which case it waits for the
    connection to establish until the underlying network times out.

name: mapreduce.ifile.readahead.bytes
description: Configuration key to set the IFile readahead length in bytes.
